Text.Page:
Apparently, the Mysterium wants to study the local mushrooms. Something about recording the energy corruption orâ€”look, the Mysterium wants mushrooms, so they're going to get them.

Shadow mushrooms aren't hard to find. They're around the Skyleaves area. Collect some and give them to Tethan at Dusk Camp.

He'll be thrilled, or as thrilled as an elf gets.

These specimens will help us identify the source of the unseelie treachery. We suspect Thulsa, but there's enough argon activity around here to point to them as well.

Jola has apparently started a pool on the outcome.
